t: Amazon's Treasure Truck sells deals out of the back of a truck
s: June 30, 2018 - In 25 U.S. cities, as well as in the U.K., Amazon runs a promotion called the Treasure Truck. Its a truck that visits multiple locations around a city and sells just one product a day at a discount.
